name: Panco's Journey
description: Incarnate Panco, a white little cat, on his journey to save all Elemalia's residents, trapped in their own home due to a terrible tempest. Control up to three different natural elements and interact with your environment to progress through puzzles and grab the coins dispersed around the world!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256MB Graphics Card DirectX: Version 9.0
